p: Driven problem solver, looking to expand Full Stack web development skills and apply experience in data analytics and mathematics. Hungry to learn new technologies and discover niche in the web development world. Team player that is self-driven and a lifelong learner, with excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Graduated from UMass Amherst, with a B.S. in Mathematics. Earned a Full Stack Web Development certificate from University of New Hampshire in 2021.
Currently employed with Foresight Regulatory Strategies, Inc. Responsible for analyzing data, generating reports, and managing the inventory database (built from scratch using FileMaker.)
